description: Alterations to existing conservatory including change to flat roof with roof light, and alterations to fenestration
decision_conditions: The proposed rear extension would, by reason of its excessive height and position on to the boundaries of the site, be an intrusive and unneighbourly development as well as having an adverse effect on the amenities of adjacent occupiers contrary to Policy 7 (Residential design and amenity) of the Local Plan 2021 and the policy advice in the NPPF 2024.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent on 09.07.2025
